title: What are the continual changes in a changing technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: When people started cultivation, nothing changed for tens of years. Now in technology, there is marriage between material, hardware, software and market demand. By the time you understand hardware, software changes and when you develop a grip over hardware and software, material changes and the demand changes. Keeping all 4 married and stay together, can only be done by big compnies and their ancillary units.
